name: Merlin's Demon War (Kateryna Bezverkha)
description:
Defeat as many demons as possible by casting spells. The moves are carried out in turn. At the start of each turn, you restore 1 unit of mana. Accumulate more mana to cast more powerful spells or use potions for healing. Spells of the same element with the enemy inflict less damage on him. You can also skip your turn or burn an unwanted card to get a new one.

This game was created during the training course "Introduction to Video Games Creation"  from XAMK Open University. Thanks to the teachers for the help and the materials provided!
